instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Outfit' font for all headings. Import from Google Fonts.
Use 'Public Sans' for body text. Import from Google Fonts.
Implement a 'Dark Mode' toggle using Tailwind's 'dark' class.
For the Chatbot Interface, use a 'Glassmorphic' container floating on the right or a dedicated split-screen view.
Use 'Recharts' for the Credit Score gauge and Loan EMI charts.
Use 'Framer Motion' for the Sanction Letter generation animation (e.g., a document scanning effect).
Ensure all forms (KYC, Loan Application) use 'react-hook-form' with 'zod' validation.
Use 'Sonner' for all toast notifications (e.g., 'Loan Approved', 'Document Uploaded').
The Dashboard must show: Active Loans, Pre-approved Offers, and Credit Score.
The Master Agent Chat must be the central interaction point.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
